name: Cold Press Juicer, ZASMIRA Juicer Machines for Vegetable and Fruit with Upgraded Juicing Technology, Powerful Quiet Motor, Compact Size for Space-Saving Juicer, Easy to Clean
about_this_item: „ÄêEnhanced Cold Press Technology„ÄëZasmira cold press juicer features advanced 3-in-1 cold press technology, combined with 0.1mm ultra-fine compound grinding teeth ensures to extract juice which preserves vital nutrients and enzymes with enhanced purity and optimal absorption, making it an ideal choice for health-conscious individuals.

„ÄêLock Design, Locked Nutrition, Juice "JAR"„Äë Zasmira juicer machines adopts the plug design to lock nutrition and avoid oxidation during juicing. Meanwhile, you can use it as a walking juice bottle to store the juice and drink it whenever you want or get a refill. This makes it a great helper for an outdoor picnic or a road trip.

„ÄêCompound Grinding Teeth Design„ÄëZasmira mini juicer comes with innovative patent design with ultra fine up-down compound grinding teeth to filter the juice from the juice pulp. This design adds the fineness and purity to the juice, and also eliminates the hassle for mesh-strainer cleaning. Our juicer adopts streamlined design, all parts can be directly flushed clean.

„ÄêCompact and Lightweight for space saving„ÄëThis cold pressed juicers designed with both functionality and aesthetics in mind. It equped with 100w Copper motor, which ensures stable and powerful performance to extract juice in a efficient way and keep the quiet operation.It has a sleek and compact design that seamlessly fits into any kitchen. Maximize your counter space.

„ÄêIdeal Gift with 3 Years of Warranty„ÄëZasmira masticating juicer can handle a variety of ingredients from leafy greens, vegetables to soft fruits and hard fruits. With a 3-year warranty and 24/7 customer service, not only it is a practical addition to your kitchen, but also an ideal gift for you loved ones, let's cheer for health!
